sentences: Sumire Morohoshi (諸星 すみれ, Morohoshi Sumire, born April 23, 1999) is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer from Kanagawa Prefecture.
In 2006, at the age of seven, she voiced Carrie in the anime series Red Garden and was shocked by the performance of Takehito Koyasu that she co-starred.
In 2009, at the age of nine, Morohoshi voiced Nina Tucker in Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood and the staff and co-stars evaluated that her "acting is skillful."
